Text: many thanks. you are a legend mate.maybe there is a separate torrent for the real rare stuff? still find it hard to find the 900's (approx)  tales, not sure what they were called. the emperors new clothes,  little mermaid etc. were awesome.. i got the megatorrent and it seems incomplete.( mind you no complaints) back covers movie poster style stuff etc , alot is missing. maybe you know a mad enthusiast that has these scanned? cheers .
